name: Fairy Runes
description:
The fairy kingdom has been invaded by evil wizards. Use runestones by stacking three in a row or more to defeat the villains. A logical strategy game where you should think about which colors of stones to put together and which magic is better to use and improve. There are two characters to choose from, a fairy and a wizard, each with their own unique abilities.

How to play:

Runestones of different colors fall on the playing field, stones of the same color should be combined. Each color allows you to use a certain magic. The red stone is a fireball. Green is a poisonous drop. Blue is a freezing vortex. Yellow is lightning. The power of magic power can be improved in the shop by selecting the magic icon and spending crystals found in battle. In the shops, you can still exchange crystals for other useful items. It is important that during the battle the hero remains alive until the end of the round, defeating the attacking monsters.
